en.EVENT_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Give a title to your event
en.DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Write a few words about your event
en.EVENT_FORM_DETAILS_FOREWORD: Please enter some details about your event.
en.EVENT_FORM_DETAILS_FOREWORD_MULTILINGUAL: Please enter some details about your event. Please consider that your audience is multilingual so please do make an effort to write the description in other languages too.
en.TIME_EXPLANATION: In the following, please enter the times of start and end of your event. In the near future we will allow you to insert repeating events as well!
en.must-provide-location-address: Please provide name of the venue
en.must-provide-location-name: Please provide address of the venue

es.EVENT_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Da un titulo a tu evento
es.DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Escribe unas palabras sobre tu evento
es.EVENT_FORM_DETAILS_FOREWORD: Por favor, añade unos detalles sobre tu evento
es.EVENT_FORM_DETAILS_FOREWORD_MULTILINGUAL: Por favor, añade unos detalles sobre tu evento. Ten en cuenta, que tu publico es multilingual así que por favor, haz el esfuerzo de escribir las descripciones en otros idiomas también
es.TIME_EXPLANATION: En lo siguiente por favor pon el tiempo de cuando empieza y termina tu event. ¡En el proximo futuro te haramos posible crear eventos repetitivos!
